name: Cricket 2005
description:
PAD UP FOR THE ASHES SHOWDOWN

    VIVID MATCH DETAIL

    CREATE YOUR OWN LEGENDS

    INTENSE DAY/NIGHT CLASHES

    FEATURES
        INTUITIVE GAMEPLAY
        Unleash all the shots in the book, let loose an
        artful array of deliveries and take complete
        control in the field.

        MATCH REALISM
        Select players from fully-licensed teams, weigh
        up authentic abilities to pick your best eleven,
        then grapple with dynamic weather, wicket and
        ball conditions out in the middle.

        TV-STYLE PRESENTATION
        Soak up the big-game atmosphere with
        TV-style production an insightful commentary
        from cricketing legends Richie Benaud and
        Jim Maxwell.

        TWENTY20
        Take on the tournament that's smashed world
        cricket into the 21st century. Contest intense
        day/night games in this 20-over, no-hold-barred cricket explosion.
